response.overview: This trio of programs gathers inspiration from animals, illustrating the wild kingdom's influence on the ways of humankind. In "Gift of the Whales," a Native American boy discovers the beauty of the ocean's creatures. In "Spirit of the Eagle," a young boy and his friends learn all about the United States' national symbol. In "Winter Wolf," a Native American girl consults a specialist to learn more about the animal living on her family's ranch.
response.title: Spirit of the Animals
